CatDescriptText: Mr. Thomas Brown, 319 Dinwiddle Street, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 14, 1958, pg. 8, with question: �Do you think ministers should invest in business enterprises for profit, or become executives or directors of such concern?� Answer reads: �I don�t think so.  It is a known fact that business is not any business for a preacher or a Man of God.  Business is a way of cheating and that is not the way of the minister.  He is of the way of living or preaching the way of life a person should live.�
TitMainTitle: Thomas Brown standing in front of shoe repair shop, with 7th St. Cafe in background
